content: how to crochet the tail into the skipped stitches and chain from r16 of the body r1 double_crochet in each st 16 sts r2 double_crochet 3 decrease double_crochet 3 x 2 14 sts r3 double_crochet 5 decrease x 2 12 sts r4 double_crochet 2 decrease double_crochet 2 x 2 10 sts begin stuffing r5 double_crochet 3 decrease x 2 8 sts continued on next page 5 ©handmade by ani 2020 instagram @handmade__byani | facebook @handmadebyaniau tail continued r6 double_crochet 1 decrease double_crochet 1 x 2 6 sts r7 double_crochet 1 decrease x 2 4 sts finish stuffing fasten_off and leave a long thread thread the yarn through the front loops of the 4 sts and pull to close weave in the end small spike make 1 completed tail 8 ply cotton in blue r1 4 double_crochet in magic_ring 4 sts r2 double_crochet 1 increase x 2 6 sts r3 double_crochet 1 increase double_crochet 1 x 2 8 sts fasten_off and leave a long thread for sewing - we will be using the thread from the small spike to sew all the spikes to the body medium spike make 3 8 ply cotton in blue r1 4 double_crochet in magic_ring 4 sts r2 double_crochet 1 increase x 2 6 sts r3 double_crochet 1 increase double_crochet 1 x 2 8 sts r4 double_crochet 3 increase x 2 10 sts fasten_off - no need to leave a long thread as we will be using the thread from the small spike to sew these spikes to the body 6 ©handmade by ani 2020 instagram @handmade__byani | facebook @handmadebyaniau x-small spike make 1 - optional 8 ply cotton in blue r1 4 double_crochet in magic_ring 4 sts r2 double_crochet 1 increase x 2 6 sts fasten_off - no need to leave a long thread as we will be using the thread from the small spike to sew this spike to the body putting it all together sew small spike over rounds 1 and 3 of the head and body sew the 3 medium spikes in a line using the thread from small spike optional sew x-small spike last finished dino disclaimer please do not redistribute sell or claim this pattern whole or in part as your own you may sell finished items handmade by you in limited quantities from this pattern - if you do please credit handmade by ani anika kam as the designer 7 ©handmade by ani 2020 instagram @handmade__byani | facebook @handmadebyaniau your colourful mini dino is now finished i would love to see your makes please share them with me via email or tag me on social media and use these hashtags #handmadebyani #colourfulminidino get in touch instagram @handmade__byani facebook handmade by ani / @handmadebyaniau email handmadebyani2017@gmail com blog https //handmadebyani blogspot com/ find more patterns on lovecrafts and ravelry disclaimer please do not redistribute sell or claim this pattern whole or in part as your own you may sell finished items handmade by you in limited quantities from this pattern
